title: A requested NODE should contain valid timestamps
gherkin:
Given there exists a "<node_type>" "A"
When the user requests the "<node_type>" "A"
And the following properties in the response should contain a valid timestamp
  | key        |
  | created_at |
  | updated_at |

Examples:
  | node_type     |
  | COMPANY       |
  | BRAND         |
  | CAR MODEL     |
  | RACE TRACK    |
  | TRACK LAYOUT  |
  | RACING SERIES |
  | RACING EVENT  |
  | IMAGE         |
